fixes.name: fixed netting (T -1)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR v1 =
    CALCULATE(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[fixed netting 3 R (T-1)],
        ALLEXCEPT(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[CounterParty],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Cash curr],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Maturity Date]
        )
    )
VAR v2 =
    CALCULATE(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[fixed netting 3 RR (T-1)],
        ALLEXCEPT(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[CounterParty],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Cash curr],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Maturity Date]
        )
    )
RETURN
IF(v1 < v2, v1, v2)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau FIXED LOD to a measure using CALCULATE with ALLEXCEPT to preserve the FIXED partitioning on RpDate, CounterParty, Cash curr and Maturity Date. The Tableau MIN of two expressions is implemented with IF(v1 < v2, v1, v2) after computing each expression in that fixed context.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD, which is an aggregation/context-aware calculation; such expressions must be implemented as measures in Power BI.
